get.summary: Get the list of all timesheets and related billing items within a provided time range.
get.description: The API requires in input a time range, defined as starting date and time and ending date and time in the UTC format.

parameters.name: utcStarDate
parameters.description: Starting date and time of the time range to be considered for the search (example: "2023-09-21T00:00:00.000Z")

parameters.name: utcEndDate
parameters.description: Ending date and time of the time range to be considered for the search (example: "2023-09-21T00:00:00.000Z")

403.description: Action Forbidden. It is ot possible to perform this action because you are not authorized.

422.description:
Unexpected Error getting billing items info   
            Start Date cannot be greater then End Date

500.description: Internal Server Error. The server encountered an error and could not complete  your request.

post.summary: Set as manually billed one or more billing items supplied as input.
post.description:
The API requires in input a list with one or more integers, each of them representing the Kleos numeric identifier of the billing item being set as manually billed.  
Body parameters : Array of integers, each of them representing the Kleos numeric identifier of a not billed billing item.

403.description: Action Forbidden. It is ot possible to perform this action because you are not authorized.

422.description:
Billing item doesn't exist.  
            Cannot update billing item billing item identifier, the current status was not set to 'NotBilled'.

500.description: Internal Server Error. The server encountered an error and could not complete  your request.

get.summary: Get the list of all timesheets and related billing items that are within a provided time range.
get.description: The API requires in input a time range, defined as starting date and time and ending date and time in the UTC format.

parameters.name: utcStarDate
parameters.description: Starting date and time of the time range to be considered for the search (example: "2023-09-21T00:00:00.000Z").

parameters.name: utcEndDate
parameters.description: Ending date and time of the time range to be considered for the search (example: "2023-09-21T00:00:00.000Z").

403.description: Action Forbidden. It is ot possible to perform this action because you are not authorized.

422.description: Unexpected Error getting billing items info.

500.description: Internal Server Error. The server encountered an error and could not complete  your request.

get.summary: Look for one or more cases using different search criteria.
get.description: Kleos cases can be searched specifying reference, name, description and clients, based on a full-text search algorithm.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: It is the string containing the criteria for the search; available criteria include: case name, case reference, case description and clients names.

parameters.name: currentPage
parameters.description: It can be be used to specify the page that has to be returned.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: It specifies the number of items to be included in each returned page.

422.description:
Found events linked to the case.  
            Found tasks linked to the case.  
            Found time-sheet activities linked to the case.  
            Found documents linked to the case.  
            Found accounting items linked to the case.  
            Found Billing Documents linked to the case.  
            Found Billing Clients linked to the case.  
            Found Billing items with no activity linked to the case.

            The identity is referenced by tasks or appointments.

This API returns a paginated list of the identity link types available in the firm settings; the request can be customized to get  .
all the types or only the active ones.

parameters.description: It can be be used to specify the page that has to be returned.

parameters.name: pageSize

parameters.description: When it is set to "True" only the active types are retrieved, otherwise all the types are retrieved.

id.description: Kleos internal identifier of the retrieved object.

street.description: It is the name of the road.

houseNumber.description: It is the number of the house.

zipCode.description: It is the number of the postal code.

countryCode.description: It is a short alphanumeric identification code of the country.

country.description: It is the name of the country.

town.description: It is the name of the city/town.

provinceCode.description: It is the code of the province.

success.description:
Indicates success status of the result.
Set WoltersKluwer.Core.Web.Models.WKAjaxResponseBase.Error if this value is false.

unAuthorizedRequest.description: This property can be used to indicate that the current user has no privilege to perform this request.

id.description: Kleos internal identifier of the retrieved object.

categories.description: Kleos internal identifier of the timesheet

activityID.description: List of Category Export Dto associated to current Item

activityTypeID.description: Kleos internal identifier of the timesheet type

caseID.description: Kleos internal identifier of the belonging case

caseType.description: Name of the belonging case Name of the belonging case

caseCreationDate.description: Creation date and time of the belonging case (example: "2023-09-21T10:16:32")

firstClientInfo.description: First name, last name and VAT code of the first client added to the belonging case

firstClientVatNumber.description: VAT code of the first client added to the belonging case

firstClientIdentityID.description: Kleos internal identifier of the identity involved as first client into the beloging case

firstClientIdentityCode.description: Code of the identity involved as first client into the beloging case

performerIdentityID.description: Kleos internal identifier of the identity set as owner of the timesheet

performerIdentityCode.description: Code of the identity set as owner of the timesheet

performerMiddleName.description: Middle name of the identity set as owner of the timesheet

performerLastName.description: Last name of the identity set as owner of the timesheet

performerFirstName.description: First name of the identity set as owner of the timesheet

feeTableCode.description: Kleos internal code of the fee table used for the timesheet

typeID.description: Kleos internal identifier of the billing item

categoryName.description: Name of the category of billing item (example: "time")

unitOfMeasure.description: Unit of measurement of the category of billing item (example: "hour")

unitAmount.description: Unit amount of the billing item

timeAmount.description: Time amount of the billing item

internalValue.description: Internal amount of the billing item

internalFeeValue.description: Internal rate amount of the billing item

internalExpenseValue.description: Internal expense amount of the billing item

externalValue.description: External amount of the billing item

externalFeeValue.description: External rate amount of the billing item

externalExpenseValue.description: External expense amount of the billing item

billingItemPosition.description: Position of the billing item within the belonging timesheet

date.description: Creation date of the timesheet BillingItemUpdateContext

isSuccess.description: True if no error occurs, False otherwise.

errorCode.description: Internal code returned when an error occurs.

errorMessage.description: Extended description returned when an error occurs.

content.description: Object containing the set of elements that have been impacted by the API

name.description: The name of the case to be created

reference.description: The reference of the case to be created

description.description: The description of the case to be created

caseResponsibleId.description: Kleos internal identifier of the identity linked to the office member that is going to be the holder for the case being created

typeId.description: Kleos case type internal identifier of the case to be created

typeName.description: The type name of the case to be created

creationDate.description: Date and time of the case creation

officeLocationId.description: Kleos internal identifier of the office location for the case to be created

archived.description: "True" if the case is an archived case, "False" otherwise

readOnly.description: When set to "True" it allows you to inhibit the modification of some fields relating to the reference entity.

archivingDate.description: Only for archived cases, it indicates when a case has been archived

archivingReference.description: Only for archived cases it represents the reference assigned during the archiving process

isProDeo.description: "True" if the case to be created is a Pro Deo case, "False" otherwise

proDeoCaseReference.description: A specific reference that can be assigned when the case to be created is a Pro Deo case

id.description: Kleos internal identifier of the retrieved object.

name.description: Name of the Category of the case to be created

id.description: Kleos internal identifier of the retrieved object.

value.description: It is the value to be stored for the contact.

comment.description: It is the comment that Kleos optionally provide for contacts information.

idContactType.description: Kleos internal identifier of the contact type, it has to be populated with a valid Kleos contact type.

valueEx.description: It is normalized value to be stored for the contact.

id.description: Kleos internal identifier of the retrieved object.

description.description: It is the description available into Kleos for the referenced contact type.

descriptions.description: It contains the contact type description translated in all the languages available in the office.

id.description: Kleos internal identifier of the document being uploaded. It is not required when using this API, so it can be omitted or it has to be set to 0

title.description: The title to be assigned to the document being uploaded to Kleos

description.description: The description to be assigned to the document being uploaded to Kleos

caseId.description: Kleos internal identifier of the case where to upload the document

folderId.description: Kleos internal identifier of the folder where to store the document(if not provided, the document will be uploaded to the case root folder)

readOnly.description: Set it to "true" if the document being uploaded has to be read-only into Kleos, set it to "false" otherwise ("false" by default)

creationDate.description: It allows to manually set up the creation and last modification date and time of the document being uploaded. It has to be provided in the UTC format (example: "2021-06-22T17:48:36.000Z")

id.description: Kleos internal identifier of the retrieved object.

name.description: Name of the folder, in the language of the user calling the API

parentId.description: Kleos internal identifier of the parent folder, if any

caseId.description: Kleos internal identifier of the belonging case. It is set to 0 when the folder is inherited from the case type and it's not case-specific.

success.description:
Indicates success status of the result.
Set WoltersKluwer.Core.Web.Models.WKAjaxResponseBase.Error if this value is false.

unAuthorizedRequest.description: This property can be used to indicate that the current user has no privilege to perform this request.

id.description: Kleos internal identifier of the retrieved object.

extraFieldValue.description:
The data type depends on the "extraFieldDataType" attribute  
The value into the extra-field

extraFieldGroupID.description: Kleos internal identifier of the belonging extra-fields group

extraFieldGroupDescription.description: The name of the belonging extra-fields group

extraFieldDataType.description: It can take on the following values: "System.String", "System.Int32", "System.Double", "System.DateTime"

extraFieldID.description: Kleos internal identifier of the extra-field

id.description: Kleos internal identifier of the retrieved object.

firstName.description: It represents the first name of the natural-type identity.

lastName.description: It represents the last name of the natural-type identity or the denomination of the legal-type identity.

gender.description:
It can take on the following values: M=Male, F=Female, N=Neutral (only for legal-type identities)   
or U=Undefined (this latter one is the default value).

email.description: It represents the main email address of the identity.

phoneNumber.description: It represents the main phone number of the identity.

readOnly.description: When set to "True" it allows you to inhibit the modification of some fields relating to the reference entity.

addresses.description:
It is an array of objects that can be used to provide the parts of all the other additional addresses   
of the identity being created.

contacts.description:
It is an array of objects that can be used to provide email addresses, phones numbers and other types   
of info that can be used to contact the identity being created.

type.description: It can take on the following values: L=Legal or N=Natural.

vatNumber.description: It represents the VAT number of the identity.

languageId.description: It represents the Kleos internal identifier of the language for the identity.

title.description: It represents the title of the natural-type identity.

bankAccounts.description: It is an array of objects that can be used to provide detailed info about the bank accounts of the identity being created.

legalForm.description: It can be used to specify the legal form of the legal-type identity being created.

maritalStatus.description: It is an additional info that has to be used to specify the marriage status for a natural-type identity being created.

registerCommerce.description: It is an additional info that has to be used to specify the register of commerce code for the identity being created .

uniqueNationalNum.description: It is an additional info that has to be used to specify the Belgian National Number for a natural-type identity being created.

success.description:
Indicates success status of the result.

partyTypeName.description: Name of the case party type

fullName.description: Full name of the linked identity

identityParentFullName.description: Full name of the parent identity

identityParentId.description: Kleos internal identifier of the parent identity

identityChildId.description: Kleos internal identifier of the children identity

id.description: Kleos internal identifier of the retrieved object.

officeLocationName.description: Name assigned to the office location, in the format used for information in multiple languages

currentPage.description: A number that specifies the page that is returned.

temporaryIdGuid.description: Kleos internal code not useful in the APIs scope

success.description:
Indicates success status of the result.
Set WoltersKluwer.Core.Web.Models.WKAjaxResponseBase.Error if this value is false.

unAuthorizedRequest.description: This property can be used to indicate that the current user has no privilege to perform this request.

id.description: Kleos internal identifier of the retrieved object.

firstName.description: It represents the first name of the natural-type identity.

lastName.description: It represents the last name of the natural-type identity or the denomination of the legal-type identity.

gender.description:
It can take on the following values: M=Male, F=Female, N=Neutral (only for legal-type identities)   
or U=Undefined (this latter one is the default value).

email.description: It represents the main email address of the identity.

phoneNumber.description: It represents the main phone number of the identity.

readOnly.description: When set to "True" it allows you to inhibit the modification of some fields relating to the reference entity.

addresses.description:
It is an array of objects that can be used to provide the parts of all the other additional addresses   
of the identity being created.

contacts.description:
It is an array of objects that can be used to provide email addresses, phones numbers and other types   
of info that can be used to contact the identity being created.

isActive.description: "True" if the account is active, "False" otherwise.

profileCode.description: Kleos internal unique identifier of the office member profile.

success.description:
Indicates success status of the result.
Set WoltersKluwer.Core.Web.Models.WKAjaxResponseBase.Error if this value is false.

iban.description: A IBAN that is valid within the referenced country has to be provided

bic.description: A BIC/SWIFT that is valid within the referenced country has to be provided
